title: Sri Lanka OTC repo platform in operation at CSE
snippet: Sri Lanka's Colombo Stock Exchange has introduced a new over-the-counter platform to conduct repo transactions against corporate debt securities.

title: Sri Lanka to reduce 'vulnerable' international sovereign bond holdings: Jayasundera
snippet: Sri Lanka will reduce its international sovereign bond (ISB) stocks gradually without going for new such instruments in the next few years and is expected to replace them either with another debt instrument or longer tenure borrowing,
